Summary._: Northbound [F] and 71 Av bound [M] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at B'Way-Lafayette St.

LongDescription:
Some northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [G] line from Bergen St to Court Sq then via the [E] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av.
Expect delays on [E], [F], [G] and [M] trains.
This service changes are because of signal problems at B'Way-Lafayette St.
